alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 9:27PM MDT until July 21 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL WELD COUNTY... At 927 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Briggsdale, or 29 miles northeast of Greeley, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Briggsdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
